<div class="control-group">
    <label class="control-label" for="appendedtext">Set User Login</label>
    <div class="controls">
        <input id="appendedtext" name="appendedtext" class="input-xlarge" placeholder="E-mail" type="text" ng-model="newUser.email">
    </div>
</div>

<div class="control-group">
    <label class="control-label" for="radios">Select User Privileges</label>
    <div class="controls">
        <label class="radio inline" for="radios-0">
        <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-0" value="User" ng-model="newUser.userType">User</label>
        <label class="radio inline" for="radios-1">
        <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-1" value="Administrator" ng-model="newUser.userType">Administrator</label>
    </div>
</div>
